```{r}
library(roxygen2)
library(bench)
```


Original GLM R Function
```{r}
og_glm_fit = glm(y ~ x, data=data, family = binomial)
my_glm_fit = my_glm(y~ x, data=data)
```

Example data
```{r}
set.seed(1)
n = 1000
x = rnorm(n)
y = rbinom(n,1,plogis(x))
data= data.frame(y,x)
```



Comparing Original GLM and my_glm Function
```{r}
all.equal(coef(og_glm_fit, coef(my_glm_fit)))
```

Benchmarking Efficiency
```{r}
bench::mark(glm = glm(y~x, data=data, family = binomial), my_glm = my_glm(y~x, data=data), check=FALSE)
```

Unit Tests
```{r}
usethis::use_testthat()
test_that("results", {expect_equal(ceof(og_glm_fit), coef(my_glm_fit))})
devtools::test()
```
